name: ttty
author: Mikhail Korolev <self@mkrl.xyz> (https://mkrl.xyz)
description: A dead simple lightweight TypeScript terminal "emulator" that mimics terminal behaviour in the browser.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && tsc && vite build --config lib.config.js && npm run emit && rm dist/favicon.ico
scripts.build:site: npm run build:css && tsc && vite build --config site.config.js
scripts.emit: tsc --declaration --module esnext --moduleResolution node --target esnext --outDir dist src/index.ts
